<Text: The Yangshao culture was a Neolithic culture that existed extensively along the Yellow River in China.>

Text: Yangshao culture:  The culture is named after Yangshao, the first excavated representative village of this culture, which was discovered in 1921 in Henan Province by the Swedish geologist Johan Gunnar Andersson (1874–1960).
Triplets:<Yangshao
3:
--------------------
<Text: Yangshao culture:  The culture flourished mainly in the provinces of Henan, Shaanxi and Shanxi.>
